preScript.script:
mkdir fa
cd fa
#So the npm commands work with workspaces
touch package.json
echo -n 'Please enter your FontAwesome6 npm token: '
read fa6_token
npm config set '@fortawesome:registry' https://npm.fontawesome.com/
npm config set '//npm.fontawesome.com/:_authToken' ${fa6_token}
ARCHIVE=$(npm pack @fortawesome/fontawesome-free@^6 --silent 2> /dev/null)
tar -xzf ${ARCHIVE}
mv package free
ARCHIVE=$(npm pack @fortawesome/fontawesome-pro@^6 --silent 2> /dev/null)
tar -xzf ${ARCHIVE}
mv package pro

postScript.script:
node ./scripts/generate-fontawesome6-metadata --path fa/free --output glyphmaps/FontAwesome6Free_meta.json
node ./scripts/generate-fontawesome6-metadata --path fa/pro --output glyphmaps/FontAwesome6Pro_meta.json
rm -rf fa
